pr_title: Made image HTML identical to AnkiDesktop when inserting

timeline.bodyText: jetbrains annotation? that seems odd - have I missed other of these? Seems we should have a system annotations package
timeline.author: mikehardy

replies.bodyText: Default recommended by Android Studio, will convert to AndroidX NonNull
replies.author: david-allison-1

timeline.message:
Made image insert compatible with AnkiDesktop

Fixes #5237

We previously used single quotes for inserting images, which caused
issues when quoting the output in JavaScript.

This makes us compatible with the latest version of Anki Desktop (which
uses single quotes and no trailing slash).
